ValidationRule.description: If Date Survey Complete is populated, then prevent users from updating Survey related fields
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Date_Survey_Sent__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Date_Survey_Complete__c)), (ISCHANGED(Overall_Client_Experience__c) || ISCHANGED(Payroll_Rating__c) || ISCHANGED(Payroll_Rating_Issues__c) || ISCHANGED(GL_Rating__c) || ISCHANGED(TAA_Rating_Issues__c) ), $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may not modify Survey fields after the Survey is completed
